name: Time Got Crazy, it's raining Sheeps
name_original: Time Got Crazy, it's raining Sheeps
description:
Lore

When the world is ending, what should you do? This farmer was greedy and instead of taking advantage of his last seconds with his family decided to discredit the warnings and take all the sheep he could! But would such a choice have consequences?

Gameplay

Using the powers of the time gun, paralyze the sheep and lead them to the barn to earn points. Do it fast before sheepgeddon happens.

Controlls

  • W/A/S/D - Controlls the character
  • E- Hold sheep / put in the barn
  • Mouse - Point Gun
  • Mouse Left Click - Shoot
